name: Ookibloks (itch)
description:
Available Now on Windows and Mac OS X!

Purchase includes Steam key!

Cunning crabs have absconded with Ooki's banana stash!

What's an honest monkey to do in a situation like that?

Get even, of course!

Ookibloks combines the spirit of classic action puzzlers with a bright visual style and an ultra-catchy soundtrack. In this game you help Ooki the Monkey collect all his stolen bananas while avoiding enemies like crabs, ghosts, piranhas and the all-powerful Devil Cat.

Featuring:

  • 100+ stages of fruit flinging, badguy bashing monkey mayhem!
  • 9 different worlds! Each featuring 10 stages, it's own unique funky soundtrack and challenging boss character to beat!
  • Jam melodies over the music as you play with the awesome musical sound effect system! It's never the same twice!
  • Train up on your skills in "Banana Chase" mode, an endless game play variation to get the highest combo!
  • Super tough challenge stages via the Devil Cat's Volcano - for hardcore players or players looking for a real challenge!
  • Enjoy the game ad-free and with NO in-app purchases!
  • Play the game how you like with support for multiple resolutions and control via keyboard, mouse, and Xbox 360 controller!
  • Includes Original Soundtrack so you can jam to Ookibloks anywhere!
